description:
The special episode “ONE PIECE in LOVE: ONE PIECE DAY’25 Festival Eve Special”, which was surprise-screened at the ONE PIECE DAY’25 DAY1 on Saturday, August 9, 2025, is now streaming at the link below!
This time, the characters of ONE PIECE in LOVE join in on the fun of ONE PIECE DAY’25!
The episode also features Hiroshi Kitadani – known for the first ONE PIECE opening theme "We Are!" – making his debut as a voice actor!
(souce: youtube)

titles.title: ONE PIECE in LOVE: ONE PIECE DAY`25 Festival Eve Special
「恋するワンピース」ONE PIECE DAY`25 前夜祭特別編
